title: two rune pages sale 21st till 28th jan 15
body:
were is the sale? was i asleep through 21st and missed this ??
this was along with the boost lp and ex . man his is bs

replies.body: thx all, (ok ok i was asleep)
23rd, babe. Expect it to be off NA time like always though, so give it until 7pm. I croi. Want my name change!
I think it will be oce time considering ranked reset was 21st on lol website (same place 2 for 1 pages are) and I got up at 7 am on the 21st to see new season of ranked.

> [{quoted}](name=skillzorddragonb,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MEKAL1lI,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-01-22T11:32:06.480+0000)
>
> I think it will be oce time considering ranked reset was 21st on lol website (same place 2 for 1 pages are) and I got up at 7 am on the 21st to see new season of ranked.

I hope so. I am a bit paranoid because they have messed up a lot. Like, with the extra RP promotion. Either way though, the difference isn't big.
